forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 69F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 67F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 50F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High around 15C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 60F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 61F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
